subjects.name: Mathematics

switching_deadline.notes: Most schools enforce Term 1 deadline; check with school administration
exceptions: Some schools allow Term 2 with HOD approval

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot switch from Math Lit to Math after Grade 10
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Can I switch from Math Lit to Math?
What subjects do I need for engineering?
notes: Switching from Mathematical Literacy to Mathematics after Grade 10 is extremely difficult due to curriculum depth.
For most STEM HEI programmes, Mathematics at Grade 12 is required.
Engineering programs typically require 60%+ in Mathematics for admission.

subjects.name: Mathematical Literacy

switching_deadline.notes: Can switch to Mathematics if strong Grade 9 performance
exceptions: Requires HOD approval and catch-up program

prerequisites: Pass Grade 10 Mathematics or Mathematical Literacy

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot switch to Mathematics after Grade 10
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Can I do engineering with Math Lit?
What careers can I do with Math Lit?
notes: Mathematical Literacy generally excludes Engineering/Actuarial/most Computer Science degrees.
Consider IT diplomas at TVET colleges as alternative technical pathway.
Strong performance in Math Lit (70%+) opens business and humanities programs.

subjects.name: Physical Sciences

switching_deadline.notes: Requires Mathematics as co-requisite
exceptions: Some schools allow Term 2 with intensive catch-up

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Physical Sciences in Grade 11
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Physical Sciences for engineering?
Can I add Physical Sciences in Grade 11?
notes: Many HEIs require Physical Sciences AND Mathematics for Engineering programs.
Check faculty-specific APS and subject requirements.
Practical component requires lab access - confirm with school.

subjects.name: Life Sciences

switching_deadline.notes: Popular subject - check class availability
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 if space available

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Life Sciences in Grade 11
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Life Sciences for nursing?
notes: Essential for all health science programs.
Medicine requires Life Sciences + Physical Sciences + Mathematics.
Nursing requires Life Sciences but Physical Sciences is optional.

subjects.name: English Home Language

switching_deadline.notes: Compulsory subject - cannot be dropped
Compulsory subject
Compulsory subject

query_triggers: Can I switch English HL to FAL?
notes: Compulsory subject - must be taken by all students.
University admission requires minimum 50% in English HL or 60% in English FAL.
Law programs typically require 65%+ in English.

subjects.name: Accounting

switching_deadline.notes: Popular business subject
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with catch-up

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Accounting in Grade 11 - too much content to catch up
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Accounting for business studies?
notes: Essential for Chartered Accountancy pathway.
BCom programs prefer Accounting but may accept strong Mathematics + Economics.
Requires strong mathematical skills and attention to detail.

subjects.name: Business Studies

switching_deadline.notes: Popular business subject - check class availability
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with catch-up

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Business Studies in Grade 11 - extensive content to catch up
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Business Studies for management?
notes: Grade 10: Business environments, roles, and sectors basics.
Grade 11: Intermediate entrepreneurship and operations management.
Grade 12: Advanced applications in marketing, HR, and financial management.
Includes case studies and business plan projects.

subjects.name: Economics

switching_deadline.notes: Analytical subject - Mathematics co-requisite helpful
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with intensive support

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Economics in Grade 11 - complex theoretical foundation needed
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Mathematics for Economics?
notes: Grade 10: Basic economic problems, circular flow, economic systems.
Grade 11: Microeconomics (markets, production) and business cycles.
Grade 12: Macroeconomics (growth, unemployment) and contemporary issues (globalization, poverty).
Assessment includes data response questions and essays on economic policies.

subjects.name: Geography

prerequisites: Basic map skills from lower grades

switching_deadline.notes: Requires practical mapwork skills
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with map skills catch-up

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Geography in Grade 11 - extensive mapwork foundation needed
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Geography for urban planning?
notes: Grade 10: Physical geography (atmosphere, geomorphology).
Grade 11: Human geography (population, urban/rural settlement).
Grade 12: Integrated economic geography and environmental issues.
Assessment includes practical mapwork, GIS, and field trips.

subjects.name: History

switching_deadline.notes: Reading-intensive subject
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with reading support

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add History in Grade 11 - extensive content knowledge required
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need History for political science?
notes: Grade 10: 19th century transformations in southern Africa.
Grade 11: 20th century world history (colonialism, nationalism, Cold War).
Grade 12: Post-WWII independence in Africa, civil society protests, ideas of race.
Assessment includes source-based questions and extended essays.

subjects.name: Information Technology

switching_deadline.notes: Requires computer lab access - check school facilities
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 if lab space available

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add IT in Grade 11 - programming foundation essential
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need IT for software engineering?
notes: Grade 10: Hardware/software basics, introduction to programming.
Grade 11: Intermediate coding (Java/Delphi), networks, databases.
Grade 12: Advanced systems, web design, social implications of technology.
Assessment includes practical programming tasks and theory exams.

subjects.name: Consumer Studies

switching_deadline.notes: Requires specialized facilities - check school resources
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 if facilities available

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Consumer Studies in Grade 11 - practical skills foundation needed
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Consumer Studies for fashion design?
notes: Grade 10: Consumer rights/responsibilities, basic food and nutrition.
Grade 11: Clothing production, housing, intermediate food preparation.
Grade 12: Advanced management, entrepreneurship, sustainable consumption.
Assessment includes practical assessments (cooking, sewing) and projects.

subjects.name: Tourism

switching_deadline.notes: Growing industry subject
exceptions: May be added in Term 2 with geography support

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add Tourism in Grade 11 - industry knowledge foundation needed
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Tourism for event management?
notes: Grade 10: SA tourism focus - sectors, attractions, transport.
Grade 11: Africa tourism, customer service, sustainable tourism.
Grade 12: World tourism, global events, marketing strategies.
Assessment includes case studies and tour planning projects.

subjects.name: Afrikaans Home Language

switching_deadline.notes: Language proficiency required
exceptions: May switch between HL/FAL with language assessment

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add new language in Grade 11
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need Afrikaans for government jobs?
notes: Language structures, literature (poems, novels, drama).
HL: Deeper literary analysis and cultural contexts.
Assessment includes oral presentations and literature exams.
Valuable for multilingual competency in SA context.

subjects.name: isiZulu Home Language

switching_deadline.notes: Language proficiency required
exceptions: May switch between HL/FAL with language assessment

switching_deadline.notes: Cannot add new language in Grade 11
No subject changes allowed in Grade 12

query_triggers: Do I need isiZulu for social work?
notes: Language grammar, literature (folklore, modern texts), oral traditions.
HL: Advanced literary critique and cultural heritage focus.
Assessment includes oral tasks, comprehension, and creative writing.
Increasingly valued by universities for transformation and cultural competency.
